# The `X86InstrFMA3Group` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class is used to group &#123;132, 213, 231&#125; forms of FMA opcodes together. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

This class is used to group &#123;132, 213, 231&#125; forms of FMA opcodes together.

Each of the groups has either 3 opcodes, Also, each group has an attributes field describing it.

Definition at line 24 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86instrfma3info-h">X86InstrFMA3Info.h</a>.

### anonymous enum  {#acf05964d78e0210534dfca8c7a4c22c8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>anonymous enum : uint16&#95;t</>}>

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="acf05964d78e0210534dfca8c7a4c22c8a09d7f7041cbcc86db224cfe0cd28ff2e" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Intrinsic">
This bit must be set in the &#39;Attributes&#39; field of FMA group if such group of FMA opcodes consists of FMA intrinsic opcodes (= 0x1)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="acf05964d78e0210534dfca8c7a4c22c8af79bf3edf15af90400b4e77e3d8fd13a" />
<EnumerationListItem name="KMergeMasked">
This bit must be set in the &#39;Attributes&#39; field of FMA group if such group of FMA opcodes consists of AVX512 opcodes accepting a k-mask and passing the elements from the 1st operand to the result of the operation when the correpondings bits in the k-mask are unset (= 0x2)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="acf05964d78e0210534dfca8c7a4c22c8ad632ba2d763e0e4dba650160e18866d9" />
<EnumerationListItem name="KZeroMasked">
This bit must be set in the &#39;Attributes&#39; field of FMA group if such group of FMA opcodes consists of AVX512 opcodes accepting a k-zeromask (= 0x4)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86instrfma3info-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86instrfma3info-h">X86InstrFMA3Info.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
